# USAccDeaths

```{r fig.width=7.5}
library(forecast)
library(ahead)

plot(suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=MASS::glm.nb)))

plot((ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=stats::glm)))

plot(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=MASS::rlm))

plot(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=rvfl::rvfl))

plot(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=MASS::lqs))
```

```{r fig.width=7.5}
plot(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=stats::lsfit))
```

```{r fig.width=7.5}
plot(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=stats::lm))
```
